sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d" table="x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1"> <x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1 action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <activity_due/> <additional_assignee_list/> <approval>not requested</approval> <approval_history/> <approval_set/> <ars_id display_value="ARS 3.1">43903e93dbcd1010280df36f299619aa</ars_id> <assessment_methods_and_objects>Examine: Information system maintenanc</assessment_methods_and_objects> <assessment_objective>Determine if the organization has implemented all elements of this control as described in the control statements and implementation standard(s).</assessment_objective> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group/> <assurance/> <baseline>High</baseline> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <calendar_duration/> <close_notes/> <closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <control_definition>The organization: a. Implements procedures for the use of maintenance personnel that lack appropriate security clearances or are not U.S. citizens, that include the following requirements: 1. Maintenance personnel who do not have needed access authorizations, clearances, or formal access approvals are escorted and supervised during the performance of maintenance and diagnostic activities on the information system by approved organizational personnel who are fully cleared, have appropriate access authorizations, and are technically qualified; 2. Prior to initiating maintenance or diagnostic activities by personnel who do not have needed access authorizations, clearances or formal access approvals, all volatile information storage components within the information system are sanitized and all nonvolatile storage media are removed or physically disconnected from the system and secured. b. Develops and implements alternate security safeguards in the event an information system component cannot be sanitized, removed, or disconnected from the system.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Maintenance">a987f9fcdb211010280df36f29961998</control_family> <control_name>Individuals Without Appropriate Access</control_name> <control_number>MA-05(01)</control_number> <control_type>Mandatory Enhancement</control_type> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description/> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_id>MA-05</group_id> <group_list/> <high>true</high> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_standards/> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <low>false</low> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <moderate>false</moderate> <number>ARSC0011049</number> <opened_at>2020-06-19 13:21:27</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <priority>2</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <reference_policy>FedRAMP Rev. 4 Baseline</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls>MP-6, PL-2</related_controls> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>This control enhancement denies individuals who lack appropriate security clearances (i.e., individuals who do not possess security clearances or possess security clearances at a lower level than required) or who are not U.S. citizens, visual and electronic access to any classified information, Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI), or any other sensitive information contained on organizational information systems. Procedures for the use of maintenance personnel can be documented in security plans for the information systems.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:27</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>ed87f9fcdb211010280df36f299619ac</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 13:21:27</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
